text: Jean Lassalle (; born 3 May 1955) is a French politician serving as an Independent member of the National Assembly since 2002. He was a presidential candidate in the 2017 election and again in the 2022 elections. In March 2024, Lasalle announced that it would take the lead in the “Rural Alliance” list alongside Willy Shraen, the president of the National Hunters Federation. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:French mayors
title: Jean Lassalle
